## Return Value

Returns `YES` if a command corresponding to the UIKeyCommand was found and performed, `NO` otherwise.

This method checks for a command corresponding to the provided [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIKeyCommand] and performs it, if available. The app should use this method to perform any extension commands at an appropriate time in the app’s responder object that handles the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionContext/performCommand(for:)-25rd1] action.

# performCommand(for:)

**Instance Method**

Performs the command associated with the given key command.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func performCommand(for keyCommand: UIKeyCommand) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **keyCommand**: The key command received by the first responder.

## Return Value

Returns `YES` if a command corresponding to the UIKeyCommand was found and performed, `NO` otherwise.

## Discussion

This method checks for a command corresponding to the provided [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIKeyCommand] and performs it, if available. The app should use this method to perform any extension commands at an appropriate time in the app’s responder object that handles the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionContext/performCommand(for:)-25rd1] action.
title: performCommand(for:)
